n: Carrot, Apple, Cucumber, OJ, and Turmeric Smoothie
des: "A juice similar to this was being sold at the San Diego Earth Fair. I prefer whole foods so I reproduced it as a smoothie. It's very refreshing and has a bit of tang."
ins: Combine orange juice, cucumber, carrots, apple, ice cubes, kale, lemon juice, flax seeds, chia seeds, and turmeric in a high-powered blender; blend until smooth.
